name: The Brihaspati Infotech Pvt. Ltd.
description:
The Brihaspati Infotech is a Top-rated IT Company specializing in eCommerce development, website development & mobile applications. The Brihaspati Infotech is based in India serving global clients for 10+ years.
It employs 150+ in-house team of professionals working round the clock to deliver quality services focused on Web and mobile application design, development and marketing.
 
Core areas of practice: 
eCommerce Development.
Custom Payment Gateway Integration for leading eCommerce Platforms.
Custom App Development for leading eCommerce Platforms.
eCommerce Platform Migration Services.
Custom Theme Development.
Headless eCommerce Development.
Progressive Web App (PWA) Development.
Mobile Application Development for iOS & Android.
Over the years, we have established ourselves as an acclaimed global digital service provider for Consultation, Design, Development & Marketing of Web and Mobile based applications at an affordable cost.
Our evolving experience and consistently virtuous reputation have been the payoff for unparalleled and unrelenting dedication towards 1000's of our customers around the globe.
Our core mission as a technology partner is to turn our client businesses into high-performance corporations. To achieve our goals, we devise a niche-oriented, high-performance business strategy to create, collaborate, deploy and deliver quality solutions to our global business communities.
